title.narrative: COVID-19 DIAKONIA - Strengthening Civil Society Organisations in the DRC 2018 - 2021
COVID-19 DIAKONIA - Strengthening Civil Society Organisations in the DRC 2018 - 2021

description.narrative: The programme describes how Diakonia intends to strengthen Congolese civil society organization and administrative as well self-management capacity in the DRC. It also describes objectives and proposed results, mainly focused on the better understanding of the democratic process, motoring of human rights violation, capacity of women and youth leaders to engage with public institutions for life indignity as well youth pro-democracy to engage in democratic debate and to improve DRC transparency and accountability, especially during the State management.

sector.narrative: Promotion of mental health and well-being

tag.narrative: 3.4 - Till 2030 genom förebyggande insatser och behandling minska det antal människor som dör i förtid av icke smittsamma sjukdomar med en tredjedel samt främja psykisk hälsa och välbefinnande.
3.4 - By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.
